mapper.select: SELECT ta.announcement_id, ta.announcement_title, ta.announcement_content, ta.announcement_status, ta.created_at, ta.updated_at, ta.member_id, tm.member_nickname FROM tb_announcement ta INNER JOIN tb_member tm ON ta.member_id = tm.member_id WHERE ta.announcement_status = false;

SELECT ta.announcement_id, ta.announcement_title, ta.announcement_content, ta.created_at, ta.updated_at, ta.member_id, tm.member_name FROM tb_announcement ta INNER JOIN tb_member tm ON ta.member_id = tm.member_id WHERE ta.announcement_status = false AND ta.announcement_id = #{announcementId};

SELECT ta.announcement_id, ta.announcement_title, ta.announcement_content, ta.created_at, ta.updated_at, ta.member_id, tm.member_name FROM tb_announcement ta INNER JOIN tb_member tm ON ta.member_id = tm.member_id WHERE ta.announcement_status = false AND ( ta.announcement_title LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR ta.announcement_content LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') );

SELECT ta.announcement_id, ta.announcement_title, ta.announcement_content, ta.created_at, ta.updated_at, ta.member_id, tm.member_name FROM tb_announcement ta INNER JOIN tb_member tm ON ta.member_id = tm.member_id WHERE ta.member_id = #{memberId} AND ta.announcement_status = false
